hero.name: Thomas Cezar
hero.title: Developer & Commissining Engineer
hero.description: I build modern, responsive web applications with Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

about.title: About Me
about.meta_description: Learn more about Thomas Cezar, a passionate web designer and developer with over 8 years of experience in creating beautiful, functional websites and applications.
about.background_content_1: I'm a passionate web designer and developer based in Southampton, UK with over 8 years of experience creating beautiful, functional websites and applications.
about.background_content_2: After graduating with a degree in Computer Science, I worked with several agencies before deciding to focus on creating bespoke websites for clients who need a unique online presence.
about.background_content_3: I believe in clean, efficient code and thoughtful design that puts the user experience first. Every project I take on receives my full attention and dedication to quality.
about.approach_user_centered_content: I create websites with the end user in mind, focusing on intuitive navigation, accessibility, and engaging experiences.
about.approach_modern_tech_content: I stay up-to-date with the latest web technologies and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
about.approach_collaborative_content: I work closely with clients throughout the development process, ensuring their vision is realized at every step.

timeline_items.title: Lead Web Developer
